question: Which among the following is the horizon from which the minerals of aluminium and iron and other minerals are removed because of percolation of water downwards?
explanation: The process of removal of minerals from soil horizon is called Eluviation. Eluviated layer (E) in the soil profile exists below the A layer and the minerals are eluviated because of percolation of water downwards which forms Iluviated layer (B) below the E layer. E layer is comparatively lighter in colour compared to A and B layers.
